rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious, inviting entrance that includes a reception area with Bohemian decor elements such as reclaimed wood and vibrant textiles.

rooms.name: Living-Dining Area
rooms.description: An open space combining living and dining functions. Features a comfortable seating area, creative lighting solutions, eclectic Bohemian decor with mixed textures, and an adjoining semi-open kitchenette for casual dining.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed to be quiet and conducive to productivity. Incorporates natural light, a minimalistic yet artistic Bohemian style decor with functional storage solutions, and is placed in the northeast direction following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A modern bathroom designed for comfort and utility. Includes contemporary fixtures that complement the overall Bohemian aesthetic.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: This area serves as storage for household essentials, incorporating built-in shelves and space-efficient design to maintain a clutter-free living environment.

openings.description: Large window to bring in ample morning light as per Vastu principles.

openings.location: interior transition between living and office areas

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A versatile outdoor space designed for relaxation and social gatherings. Features Bohemian-inspired landscaping, seating areas with decorative cushions, and a small water feature for tranquility.

openings.description: Provides access to the rooftop terrace while aligning with Vastu principles for upward energy flow.
